custom-sql.sql: SELECT event.* FROM ( SELECT event.eventId, ANY_VALUE(IF((DATE(NOW()) > DATE(period.startDate) && DATE(NOW()) <= DATE(period.endDate)) || DATE(NOW()) = DATE(period.startDate),DATE(NOW()),DATE(period.startDate))) AS next_representation, ANY_VALUE(IF(DATE(firstStartDate) = DATE(lastEndDate),0,1)) AS multiple_representation FROM agenda_Event AS event INNER JOIN agenda_EventPeriod AS period ON event.eventId = period.eventID AND DATE(period.endDate) >= DATE(NOW()) WHERE event.status = 0 GROUP BY event.eventId ORDER BY next_representation, multiple_representation, lastEndDate) AS next_representations INNER JOIN agenda_Event AS event ON event.eventId = next_representations.eventId;
